articles.title: Xiaomi introduces the Redmi Note 11 series: best value for money - PhoneArena
articles.description: After teasing its Redmi Note 11 series earlier this week, Xiaomi finally unveiled three new smartphones that give new meaning to the “best value for money” concept.
